ship.name: Proteron Derivative
ship.description: While lesser known among the general public than the Kestrel, the Derivative is where Krain Industries does the majority of its business. True to its name, it's the latest in a long line of largely carrier-based fighters. Packing relatively little firepower, they're ill-suited to duelling, but a carrier group unleashing several squadrons has been known to turn the tide of battle on many occasions.
